about_badge: Built for the Saudi car market
about_subtitle: CarDeal is a smart Saudi platform that connects buyers, sellers, and brokers to make car trading faster, safer, and more transparent.
about_mission_body: We shorten the distance between a clear car request and a closed deal. By combining structured data, AI matching, and a vetted professional network, CarDeal turns fragmented conversations into one streamlined experience.
about_mission_region: Focused on the Saudi market with a regional vision.
about_value_intro: Inspired by the business model and analysis of the car marketplace, CarDeal focuses on real value for every party in the ecosystem.
about_value_point_ai_matching: AI-powered matching that understands specs, budget, and intent—not just keywords.
about_value_point_network: A wide network of showrooms, brokers, and owners activated with every new request.
about_value_point_transparency: Structured negotiations and clear records to reduce misunderstandings and wasted time.
about_segments_intro: CarDeal is designed around three core customer segments:
about_segment_buyers: Serious buyers who want to request a car once and receive competitive offers.
about_segment_showrooms: Showrooms that need a steady pipeline of qualified requests and tools to manage inventory.
about_segment_brokers: Professional brokers who match deals daily and need visibility, speed, and control.
about_partners_body: We work with trusted partners to complete the ownership journey — from financing and insurance to after-sales services.
